title: The Rek'Sai Skin that We're All Looking For
body:
I've been on-off playing since Season 1. I saw a vicious nightmare-fuel Cho'Gath become the gentleman that we all know and love today.

So Rek'Sai, this total voidborn cutie pie, has been out for some time now and I'm wondering when Riot will give her the same treatment. When will we get a Lady Rek'Sai to accompany Gentleman Cho'Gath?

Not sure if this has been posted around recently, but the artwork has been floating around for a really long time: http://i.imgur.com/CwBoIn1.jpg

(Also, the Magnificent TF skin really needs an update. It doesn't feel legendary at all!)

Cheers and clicks, everyone.

replies.body: + 1 from me

That's multiply by 1, so it changes nothing.

I'm sorry for being an ass.

But if you take the derivative, it's... 0.

Still nothing.
Upvoted. Also, have they nerfed her Q enough? Can they leave it alone yet? Please. Stahp. ;_;
They won't leave it alone until it makes Kha's Q look like the most broken ability in the game.

It's Urf the Manatee WW level of troll but this execution is pretty tight. Why do people forget Rek'sai is a girl? Because we forgot to put a bow on her of course! Jokes aside I think this would go really well with Gentleman Cho but considering she just got Pool Party which fits into a similarly humourous space it might be a while before we consider doing this one.

Pretty sure this is the original artist: http://the-void-burrower.tumblr.com/
Are you guys for real? This skin idea has most upvotes on the front page? Why would you want a void creature to wear lady clothes. Like wtf?
Why would we want a void creature to wear gentleman cloths? oh wait we already have one {{champion:31}}

cause it's a girl.  
and we can.
We did get Shark'Sai skin.
I'd use it.
*Fist pump*
I loved the idea of this skin, since the first time I saw it. I guess pool party Rek'sai will have to do for now.
I don't think it's ok to dress up Reksai in such an attire since she is female, if we are looking at her sexually, she is showing way too much skin. :({{champion:90}}
{{champion:421}} Needs her man {{champion:31}}.

> [{quoted}](name=PandaLoverXox,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WoaV222a,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-06-19T22:57:39.504+0000)
>
> {{champion:421}} Needs her man {{champion:31}}.

i rather not see the emergence of what could be if they were to copulate, hell i don't want to see them doing the dirty in the first place. but somewhere in the deepest trench of rule 34, we know, we know deep down that it exist and it beacons us to search for it.
I have seen it. The depths of hell wouldn't be able to compare to the horror of what I saw.
ALL OF MY YES. Also, I know it might be a while, but even so... worth the wait.
The cleanness of the art satisfies my OCD.
misstress rek sai
ahhahaahha amazing
Cute
Yes pls
I don't even have Rek'Sai and I need this.
I didn't know I wanted this, but now I do. So bad.

I'd love for this to be Legendary, so she'd get a new VO. 

Her laugh would be the [Noblewoman's laugh](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0AuFgZT4O-I) trope.

> [{quoted}](name=DJ Di0,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=WoaV222a,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-06-20T00:54:00.752+0000)

> 
> Her laugh would be the [Noblewoman's laugh](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0AuFgZT4O-I) trope.

yes
This would be an insta-buy for me. I dont even play rek'sai

> 
> So Rek'Sai, this total voidborn cutie pie, has been out for some time now and I'm wondering when Riot will give her the same treatment. When will we get a Lady Rek'Sai to accompany Gentleman Cho'Gath?

> Not sure if this has been posted around recently, but the artwork has been floating around for a really long time: http://i.imgur.com/CwBoIn1.jpg

> (Also, the Magnificent TF skin really needs an update. It doesn't feel legendary at all!)
> 
> Cheers and clicks, everyone.

That's an amazing skin. +1'd
There's a legendary tf skin?
But... She will get dirty underground.
Really long time as in the 6 months she's been released? lol
Rek came out at the beginning of S5, so about a year now :P
lol
They better not forget the beautiful feminine laughter and snarls and frightening cries
Genlteman Cho'Gath just wouldn't be a gentleman without his Lady.
well yeah
Like it, but it looks so odd.
Rek' Bride
They need a SHARK pool party reksai skin, not some weird goo lagoon monster pool party skin
My Fair Rek'Sai
stop with the bs rly
her ult will be her running with her groom or gentleman chogath
